scripts.install: concurrently "cd backend && npm install" "cd frontend && npm install"
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd backend && npm run dev" "cd frontend && npm run dev"
scripts.test: concurrently "cd backend && npm run test" "cd frontend && npm run test"
scripts.test:backend: cross-env NODE_ENV=test cd backend && npm test
scripts.test:frontend: cross-env NODE_ENV=test cd frontend && npm test
